Hello,

I'm Dr. Stanley Lyndon, author of the book "How to be Funny" sold at: http://www.howtobefunny.net/learn-how-to-be-funny-witty-interesting-main.htm

This is with reference to:
http://www.demonoid.ph/files/details/2088246/24198198/

The above file above appears to be an illegal share of my ebook sold at www.howtobefunny.net.

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or the law. Kindly remove the file at once, failing which we may need to proceed with formal legal notices.

You can contact me, Dr. Stanley Lyndon at 212-233-8669 (73 Spring Street, NY) or through support@blacklyon.com. Black Lyon Publishing LLC is my own publishing company, registered in New York.

I contend that all the information in the notice above is accurate, under penalty of perjury.

Sincerely,

Dr. Stanley Lyndon
Author, How to be Funny
www.howtobefunny.net
